org.kepler.objectmanager.repository

Class Repository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.objectmanager.repository.Repository
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EcogridRepository

    public abstract class Repository
extends java.lang.Object
    This interface represents a repository on the ecogrid
    Author:
    Chad Berkley

        Parameters:
        repository - the address of the repository
        username - the username of the repository
        password - the password for the repository
        authProtocol - protocol (http or https for the repository)
